amendment.description: To strike the quotation from the United States Agency for International Development regarding educated women.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2852 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2852 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Shaheen.
